Siphon_Energy.help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

Heal_Other.help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Absorb_Pain.help: Dramatically heals an ally's wounds. This power has only a tiny Endurance cost, but it requires you to sacrifice some of your Hit Points. Absorbing someone's pain can be quite dramatic, and afterwards you will be briefly unable to heal your own wounds by any means. Recharge: Slow
Absorb_Pain.shortHelp: Ally Strong Heal, Self Moderate DMG(Special)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.

Resurrect.help: Resurrects a fallen ally with full Hit Points and Endurance. The Resurrected target is left protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Resurrect.targetHelp: You have been Resurrected. You are protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds.
Resurrect.confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Resurrect you. You will have full Health and Endurance. Do you Accept?

messages.attackerHit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.

Clear_Mind.help: Frees an ally from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Also, grants target clearer Perception to see hidden foes. Protection will improve with Multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
Clear_Mind.shortHelp: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confuse), +Perception
Clear_Mind.targetHelp: Your mind has been cleared of negative effects, and you are granted temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and your Perception is improved.
Clear_Mind.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
Clear_Mind.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects.

Fortitude.help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single ally's chance to hit, Damage, and Defense to all attacks. Recharge: Long
Fortitude.targetHelp: You have been given the gift of Fortitude. Your chance to hit, Damage and Defense to all attacks have all been increased.
Fortitude.attackerHit: You greatly increase the To Hit, Damage and Defense of {PlayerDest}.
Fortitude.victimHit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your To Hit, Damage and Defense.

Recovery_Aura.help: The Recovery Aura dramatically increases the Endurance recovery rate of all nearby heroes for a limited time. Emitting this Aura costs you a lot of Endurance, and it takes a long time to recharge. Recharge: Very Long
Recovery_Aura.targetHelp: The Recovery Aura is improving your Endurance Recovery Rate, allowing you to battle longer!
Recovery_Aura.attackerHit: You increase the Endurance Recovery of {PlayerDest}.

Regeneration_Aura.help: The Regeneration Aura dramatically increases the healing rate of all nearby heroes for a limited time. Emitting this Aura costs you a lot of Endurance, and it takes a long time to recharge. Recharge: Very Long
Regeneration_Aura.targetHelp: The Regeneration Aura is improving your Healing Rate, allowing you to battle longer!
Regeneration_Aura.attackerHit: You increase the Hit Point Regeneration of {PlayerDest}.

Adrenalin_Boost.help: Dramatically increases an ally's Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate for 90 seconds. Also grants the target high resistance to slow effects. Recharge: Very Long
Adrenalin_Boost.targetHelp: The Adrenalin Boost has stimulated your system. Your Endurance recovery, Healing rate and Attack speeds are all increased and you are resistant to slow effects.
Adrenalin_Boost.attackerHit: You empower {PlayerDest} with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate.
Adrenalin_Boost.victimHit: {PlayerSource} empowers you with dramatically increased Endurance Recovery, Hit Point Regeneration and attack rate.
